functions.name: Get holders of Token
functions.description: Returns all holders of a specific token. The value of each holder is their total tokens balance.

args.name: TokenAddress
args.description: The contract address of a token

args.name: Network
args.description: The network name or ID where the Token is located. Network accepted: eth, base, bsc, fantom, avalanche, polygon, arbitrum, syscoin, optimism, eth_goerli, base_goerli, polygon_mumbai, avalanche_fuji

functions.name: Get holders of NFT
functions.description: Returns all holders of a specific NFT

args.name: TokenAddress
args.description: The contract address of an NFT

args.name: Network
args.description: The network name or ID where the Token is located. Network accepted: eth, base, bsc, fantom, avalanche, polygon, arbitrum, syscoin, optimism, eth_goerli, base_goerli, polygon_mumbai, avalanche_fuji
